ProductInfo.Features:
A wonderful quad-core 3G smartphone with high performance, powerful functions and stylish design
Adopt Android 4.2 OS, and is powered by Hisilicon K3V2E quad-core 1.5GHz CPU and 2GB RAM to ensure its running more stably
Support one Micro SIM card one standby, and is fully compatible with worldwide quad-band GSM and WCDMA 3G networks for making phone calls
Support WiFi and built-in WCDMA 3G networks for surfing internet, and also support wireless Bluetooth for data transmission and hands-free calling
With a built-in GPS module for effortless navigation, you will not get lost when going out
ProductInfo.Name: Foxnovo HUAWEI Ascend P6 K3V2E Quad-core Android 4.2 4.7-inch HD IPS Screen Dual-camera GPS 2GB/8GB 3G Smartphone (Black)
